Featured Crew Arunabh Kumar Creator Discussions   Reviews Videos   Images   Changes Report Share Discussions General  0 Content Issues  0 Images Backdrops  2 Posters  2 Videos Trailers  1 Teasers  1 Clips  0 Featurettes  0 Opening Credits  0 Top Billed Cast Jitendra Kumar Jitendra Abhay Mahajan Saurabh Mandal Naveen Kasturia Naveen Bansal Arunabh Kumar Yogendra Full Cast & Crew Last Season Season 1 2015 | 5 Episodes View All Seasons Social Reviews  1 Discussions  0 A review by Prithu  10.0 Written by  Prithu  on February 15, 2017 I have great respect for The Viral Fever team and this series is one of their best works. 
If you haven't watched it, what are you waiting for? Go Watch it now. The characters are so well written and the plot for each episode is truly amazing. TVF Pitchers touches each aspect about the difficulties and challenges faced by young entrepreneurs and portrays them in a truly marvelous way. Totally worth your Sunday afternoon.
